EmailTemplate.name: MATCHING Associate interview feedback
EmailTemplate.subject: Please complete this interview feedback form today
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Interview Feedback
Hello {!Step_Forward_Associate_Attendance__c.Associate_First_Name__c},
We hope your interview with {!Step_Forward_Associate_Attendance__c.Employer_Name__c} went well, now it’s time to give us some feedback. This feedback is important as we want to know how well you feel you were matched. Please complete the online feedback form today via the link below and make sure that you’re as honest as possible.
Click here for the feedback form
Best wishes,
Step Forward Matching Team
020 3542 2404. Option 5
stepforward.interview@the-challenge.org
(You can't reply to this email. Please send a new email to the address above)
www.stepforward.uk.com
The Challenge Network is registered in England and Wales, no 6845451. Registered charity no. 1129239. Registered address: 39 York Rd, London SE1 7NQ
